LatestNews.Content: Eagles WR Arrelious Benn has been diagnosed with a torn left ACL, and is done for the season.

LatestNews.Content: Profootballtalk.com reports Arrelious Benn will miss four weeks with a sprained right MCL suffered in Friday's training camp practice.
